member.name: IFolderBandPriv.SetAccelerators
member.param: TRUE to enable accelerators; FALSE to disable them.

member.name: IFolderBandPriv.SetCascade
member.param: TRUE to enable cascade folders; FALSE to disable them.

member.name: IFolderBandPriv.SetNoIcons
member.summary: Sets whether icons are displayed in a folder band.
member.param: TRUE to display icons; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: IFolderBandPriv.SetNoText
member.summary: Sets whether text is displayed in a folder band.
member.param: TRUE to display text; otherwise, FALSE.
